section.name: Usage
section.p: This library uses JSR-305 annotations to identify software defects easily.
This means that if the Quality-Check library is used, the JSR-305 library must exist in your classpath.
To use the library it must be added to your classpath. With Apache Maven you can start with this guide quickly.
